title: Pinging freezes game
body:
Recently when ever Im in game and haven't pinged for a while the next time i ping the game will freeze for about a second .
This has only started occuring recently but im really confused as to the cause of it :(

replies.body: Could be an asset problem while pinging, maybe with either the sound or graphic that players.  Can't really say for sure, but the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help us figure this out.  Run through each step to tune up your game, and let me know if it helps!

I've tried all those and what seemed to work was repairing the files but since the update it does it again i've repaired the files again and it seems to work mostly the problem seems to happen for some games but not for others thanks for the help on this problem
